short.ar: سوف تعجبك الأبعاد لأنها تتيح لك قياس العناصر على الصفحة بالبكسل، مثل مسطرة الصفحة.
short.am: በፒክስል ለማግኘት የሚችሉትን ኤሌመንትዎች እንዲሆኑ እናውቃለን ፡፡ ይህን ስህተት በፒክስል ሩሌር ምልክት እንዲሆኑ እናውቃለን ፡፡
short.bg: Ще харесате Dimensions, тъй като ви позволява да измервате елементи на страница в пиксели, като линийка за страница.
short.bn: আপনি ডিমেনশনগুলি পছন্দ করবেন কারণ এটি আপনাকে পিক্সেলে পৃষ্ঠার উপাদানগুলি মাপতে অনুমতি দেয়, যেমন একটি পৃষ্ঠা রুলার।
short.ca: T'agradarà Dimensions ja que et permet mesurar elements en una pàgina en píxels, com una regla de pàgina.
short.cs: Budete mít rádi Rozměry, protože vám umožní měřit prvky na stránce v pixelech, jako pravítko stránky.
short.da: Du vil kunne lide Dimensions, da det giver dig mulighed for at måle elementer på en side i pixels, ligesom en side linjal.
short.de: Sie werden Dimensions mögen, da es Ihnen ermöglicht, Elemente auf einer Seite in Pixeln zu messen, wie ein Seitenlineal.
short.el: Θα σας αρέσει το Dimensions καθώς σας επιτρέπει να μετρήσετε στοιχεία σε μια σελίδα σε pixels, σαν χάρακας σελίδας.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: You will like Dimensions as it allows you to measure elements on a page in pixels, like a page ruler.
short.es: Te gustará Dimensions ya que te permite medir elementos en una página en píxeles, como una regla de página.
short.es_419: Te gustará Dimensiones ya que te permite medir elementos en una página en píxeles, como una regla de página.
short.et: Sul meeldib Mõõtmed, kuna see võimaldab sul mõõta lehelemente pikslites, nagu leheriist.
short.fa: شما از ابعاد خواهید پسندید زیرا به شما اجازه می‌دهد تا عناصر روی یک صفحه را به پیکسل اندازه گیری کنید، مانند یک خط کش صفحه.
short.fi: Pidät Dimensioista, koska se mahdollistaa elementtien mittaamisen sivulla pikseleinä, kuten sivun viivoittimen.
short.fil: Magugustuhan mo ang Dimensions dahil ito ay nagbibigay-daan sa iyo na sukatin ang mga elemento sa isang pahina sa pixels, tulad ng…
short.fr: Vous allez aimer Dimensions car il vous permet de mesurer les éléments d'une page en pixels, comme une règle de page.
short.gu: તમને આકારો ગમશે કારણકે તે તમને પેજ પર પિક્સલમાં તત્વોનું માપણ કરવાની મંજૂરી આપે છે, જેવું પેજ રૂલર છે.
short.he: תאהב את ממדים מכיוון שהוא מאפשר לך למדוד אלמנטים בעמוד בפיקסלים, דומה לסרגל עמוד.
short.hi: आपको डायमेंशन्स पसंद आएगा क्योंकि यह आपको पिक्सेल में पृष्ठ पर तत्वों को मापने की अनुमति देता है, जैसे कि एक पृष्ठ रुलर।
short.hr: Svidjet će vam se Dimenzije jer vam omogućuje mjerenje elemenata na stranici u pikselima, poput straničnog ravnala.
short.hu: A Dimensions tetszeni fog neked, mert lehetővé teszi az elemek mérését az oldalon pixelben, mint egy oldalvonal.
short.id: Anda akan menyukai Dimensi karena memungkinkan Anda untuk mengukur elemen-elemen pada halaman dalam piksel, seperti penggaris…
short.it: Ti piacerà Dimensions poiché ti consente di misurare gli elementi di una pagina in pixel, come un righello di pagina.
short.ja: Dimensions は、ページ上の要素をピクセル単位で測定できるため、ページの定規のように便利です。
short.kn: ಪ್ರಮಾಣಗಳನ್ನು ನೀವು ಪಕ್ಷಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಪಿಕ್ಸೆಲ್‌ಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಅಳೆಯಲು ಅನುಮತಿಸುವ ರೀತಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಡಿಮೆನ್ಷನ್ಸ್‌ಅನ್ನು ಇಷ್ಟಪಡುವಿರಿ, ಹಾಗೂ ಪುಟ ಮಾಪಕವಾಗಿರುವಂತೆ.
short.ko: 픽셀 단위로 페이지의 요소를 측정할 수 있는 차원을 좋아하실 겁니다.
short.lt: Jums patiks „Dimensions“, nes jis leidžia matuoti elementus puslapyje pikseliais, kaip puslapio linijalas.
short.lv: Jums patiks "Dimensions", jo tas ļauj mērīt elementus lapā pikseļos, tāpat kā lapas lineālu.
short.ml: നിങ്ങൾക്ക് ഡിമൻഷനുകൾ ഇഷ്ടപ്പെടും, അത് ഒരു പേജിൽ ഉള്ള ഘടകങ്ങൾ പിക്സലുകളിൽ അളക്കാൻ അനുവദിക്കുന്നു, പേജ് റൂലർ പോലെ.
short.mr: आपणाला डिमेंशन्स आवडेल कारण ते आपल्याला पिक्सेलमध्ये पृष्ठावरील घटक नापण्याची परवानगी देते, जसे पृष्ठ राजा.
short.ms: Anda akan suka Dimensi kerana ia membolehkan anda mengukur elemen-elemen pada halaman dalam piksel, seperti pembaris halaman.
short.nl: Je zult Dimensions leuk vinden omdat het je in staat stelt om elementen op een pagina in pixels te meten, zoals een paginaruiter.
short.no: Du vil like Dimensjoner siden den lar deg måle elementer på en side i piksler, som en side linjal.
short.pl: Spodoba Ci się funkcja Wymiary, ponieważ pozwala ona mierzyć elementy na stronie w pikselach, jak linijka na stronie.
short.pt_BR: Você vai gostar do Dimensions, pois ele permite que você meça elementos em uma página em pixels, como uma régua de página.
short.pt_PT: Vai gostar do Dimensions, pois permite-lhe medir elementos numa página em píxeis, como uma régua de página.
short.ro: Îți va plăcea Dimensions deoarece îți permite să măsori elementele de pe o pagină în pixeli, ca un riglă de pagină.
short.ru: Вам понравится Dimensions, так как это позволяет измерять элементы на странице в пикселях, как линейка страницы.
short.sk: Budete mať radi Rozmery, pretože vám umožňuje merať prvky na stránke v pixeloch, ako pravítko stránky.
short.sl: Všeč vam bo Dimenzije, saj vam omogoča merjenje elementov na strani v slikovnih točkah, kot stranski ravnilo.
short.sr: Svideo će vam se svideti Dimenzije jer vam omogućava da merite elemente na stranici u pikselima, kao lenjir na stranici.
short.sv: Du kommer att gilla Dimensions eftersom det låter dig mäta element på en sida i pixlar, som en sidlinjal.
short.sw: Utapenda Vipimo kwani inakuruhusu kupima vipengele kwenye ukurasa kwa pikseli, kama rula ya ukurasa.
short.ta: நீங்கள் பக்கத்தில் உள்ள உறைகளை அளவு செய்ய அனுமதிக்கும் பரிமாணங்களை நீங்கள் பிக்சல் வடிவில் அளவு செய்ய முடியும் என்று நீங்கள் அளவு…
short.te: మీరు పేజీలో అంశాలను పిక్సెళ్లలో అంచనాలు చేయడానికి డిమెన్షన్స్ నచ్చుకుంటారు, పేజీ రూలర్ వంటి.
short.th: คุณจะชอบ Dimensions เพราะมันช่วยให้คุณสามารถวัดองค์ประกอบบนหน้าเว็บในหน่วยพิกเซลเหมือนกับไม้บรรทัดบนหน้ากระดาษ
short.tr: Sayfada öğeleri piksellerle ölçmenizi sağlayan Boyutları beğeneceksiniz, bir sayfa cetveli gibi.
short.uk: Вам сподобається Dimensions, оскільки вона дозволяє вимірювати елементи на сторінці у пікселях, схоже на лінійку сторінки.
short.vi: Bạn sẽ thích Dimensions vì nó cho phép bạn đo các yếu tố trên trang bằng đơn vị pixel, giống như một thước đo trang.
short.zh_CN: 您会喜欢 Dimensions，因为它允许您以像素为单位测量页面上的元素，就像一个页面标尺。
short.zh_TW: 您會喜歡 Dimensions，因為它允許您以像素為單位測量頁面上的元素，就像一把頁面尺。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌈🖥️ Introducing "Dimensions" 📏 – your ultimate companion for precision in the digital realm. This Google Chrome extension is not just another tool; it's your virtual measuring tape, empowering you to dissect and quantify every pixel on a webpage. With Dimensions, harness the power to decode the intricate geometry of web design effortlessly.

✨ Unlock the potential of pixel-perfect precision with our intuitive interface. Gone are the days of guesswork and approximation; Dimensions brings accuracy to your fingertips, allowing you to measure distances with unparalleled ease. Whether you're a seasoned developer, a meticulous designer, or simply curious about the inner workings of your favorite websites, this extension is your gateway to the world of digital dimensions.

🌐 At its core, Dimensions (or Page Ruler) functions as a dynamic page ruler, providing you with a comprehensive suite of measurement tools tailored for the web. Seamlessly integrated into your browsing experience, it offers a streamlined solution for gauging distances in pixels. Say goodbye to cumbersome manual calculations and hello to instant insights at a glance. 

Here's what Dimensions brings to the table:

1️⃣ Effortless Precision: With a simple click and drag, effortlessly measure the dimensions of any element on a webpage. From buttons to banners, every pixel is within your grasp, ensuring pixel-perfect perfection in your digital endeavors.

2️⃣ Interactive Guidance: Our measure ruler doesn't just stop at static measurements. It provides real-time feedback, guiding you with interactive overlays that highlight the dimensions as you explore the page. Navigate with confidence, knowing that every move is met with instant clarity.

3️⃣ Customizable Units: Tailor your measurements to suit your workflow with customizable units. Whether you prefer pixels, ems, or percentages, Dimensions adapts to your preferences, ensuring seamless integration with your existing toolkit.

4️⃣ Multi-dimensional Insights: Dive deep into the intricacies of web design with multi-dimensional insights. Measure not only the width and height but also the margins, paddings, and everything in between. Uncover the hidden structure beneath the surface, unraveling the mysteries of pixel placement with ease.

5️⃣ Cross-platform Compatibility: Wherever the web takes you, Dimensions follows. Enjoy cross-platform compatibility that extends beyond Chrome, ensuring that you're never without your trusty measure ruler, whether you're on desktop or mobile.

🚀 With dimensions, every pixel tells a story. Whether you're fine-tuning a responsive layout, conducting a thorough accessibility audit, or simply satisfying your curiosity, this extension empowers you to explore the page with newfound clarity. 🖥️

But Dimensions isn't just a tool; it's a catalyst for creativity. Beyond its practical applications, it serves as a canvas for experimentation and innovation. Break free from the confines of conventional design constraints, and let your imagination run wild as you navigate the digital landscape with newfound precision.

Imagine the possibilities:

▸ Crafting pixel-perfect prototypes with surgical precision.
▸ Optimizing user interfaces for maximum impact and accessibility.
▸ Uncovering design secrets hidden in plain sight, waiting to be discovered.

In a world where every pixel counts, Dimensions gives you the power to make them count. Join the ranks of developers, designers, and digital enthusiasts who rely on Dimensions to elevate their craft and unlock new dimensions of possibility. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a curious newcomer, this extension is your key to unlocking the true potential of the web.
Experience the future of digital dimensionality. 

Install Dimensions today and see the web in a whole new light. ✨
